arts.ttl: Greece v Scotland: team news, KO time & where to watch
arts.sum: Scotland face Greece tonight in the penultimate game of their World Cup Qualifying journey. The Tartan Army are in Greece to get a result in order to set up a straight shootout against Denmark for a place in the World Cup next summer.
